Notes

Ground rules and expectations.

  • Separation by design: This hub presents distinct categories (Business / Mission / Tools / Ideas) without blending claims across domains.
  • Privacy-forward: No tracking pixels, no ad tech, and no publication of private repositories or evidence assets.
  • Calm civics language: This site avoids inflammatory framing and sticks to factual descriptions.
